me.normanmaurer.niosmtp

Interface SMTPRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LMTPRequest, SMTPRequestImpl

    public interface SMTPRequest
    A SMTP Request which is send to the SMTP-Server
    Author:
    Norman Maurer
